about_the_game:
Invaders 360 is a classic shoot'em up arcade game.


The enemies appear from all sides, so you must defend the stations 360 degrees.

Between station battles, you must cross the asteroid belt to get to the secret supply station to repair and equip your ship.

If you fail in your attempt to defend the stations, purchase more powerful ships and equipment for your fleet and try again.

Are you ready to claim the high score?

Story

In the faraway year 2750 AD the galaxy, no longer a frontier to be explored, had been carved into territories controlled by colossal mega corporations, each vying for supremacy and control.

You are part of Space Rangers Ltd., a group that helps keep others safe in exchange for money. Your new job is a big one: Protect four Space Trading Inc. stations from the Mars Galaxy Corporation.

Out in space, stars twinkle like tiny gems, and you fly towards the stations. The Mars ships appear on your radar, ready to cause trouble. The hum of lasers fills the air as you fight to protect the stations. Your heart races, and you can feel the tension in the air.

You're the guardian of these stations, the one who stands between them and the Mars Corporation.

The year 2750 is full of challenges, and you're here to face them head-on.
The Mars Corporation might be big and scary, but you're the defender, the hero of this story.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 680 / AMD Radeon HD 7970 or better

  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
